snippet: President Muhammadu Buhari took office in May promising to halt the graft dragging the country down.
abstract: Nigerian Pres Muhammadu Buhari fires Ibrahim Lamorde, chairman of Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, country’s main anti-corruption entity.
lead_paragraph: President Muhammadu Buhari took office in May promising to halt the graft dragging the country down.

headline.main: Nigeria: Head of Graft-Fighting Agency Is Latest to Be Fired by the President
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Head of Graft-Fighting Agency Is Latest to Be Fired by the President
